name: http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/FTPServer
desc: This service provides access to a device's FTP folders.

CreateFTPFolder.name: http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/CreateFTPFolder
CreateFTPFolder.desc: This action creates a new FTP folder on the device.

name.desc: The name of the FTP folder. This value must be unique. This value must be between 1 and 22 characters long and may only contain characters a-z, A-Z, 0-9, dash (-), and space ( ).

partitionName.desc: The name of the partition on which the FTP folder resides.

path.desc: The path to the directory that corresponds to the FTP folder. Relative paths are interpreted as relative to the root directory of the partition.

isReadOnly.desc: Whether the FTP folder is read-only.

groupsWithPermission.desc: The list of groups that have permission to access the FTP folder. This list must always include the value "admin".

errors.ErrorAdminGroupMustHavePermission: The specified list of groups with permission does not contain "admin".
errors.ErrorFolderExists: An FTP folder with the specified name already exists.
errors.ErrorPathDoesNotExist: The specified path does not exist.
errors.ErrorTooManyFolders: The FTP folder cannot be created because the maximum number of FTP folders has already been reached.
errors.ErrorUnknownGroup: One of the specified groups with permission does not exist.
errors.ErrorUnknownPartition: The specified partition does not correspond to any mounted partition.

DeleteFTPFolder.name: http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/DeleteFTPFolder
DeleteFTPFolder.desc: This action deletes an FTP folder on the device.

name.desc: The name of the FTP folder.

errors.ErrorUnknownFolder: The specified FTP folder does not exist.

EditFTPFolder.name: http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/EditFTPFolder
EditFTPFolder.desc: This action edits information about an FTP folder on the device.

name.desc: The name of the FTP folder.

partitionName.desc: The name of the partition on which the FTP folder resides.

path.desc: The path to the directory that corresponds to the FTP folder. Relative paths are interpreted as relative to the root directory of the partition.

isReadOnly.desc: Whether the FTP folder is read-only.

groupsWithPermission.desc: The list of groups that have permission to access the FTP folder. This list must always include the value "admin".

errors.ErrorAdminGroupMustHavePermission: The specified list of groups with permission does not contain "admin".
errors.ErrorPathDoesNotExist: The specified path does not exist.
errors.ErrorUnknownFolder: The specified FTP folder does not exist.
errors.ErrorUnknownGroup: One of the specified groups with permission does not exist.
errors.ErrorUnknownPartition: The specified partition does not correspond to any mounted partition.

GetFTPFolders.name: http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/GetFTPFolders
GetFTPFolders.desc: This action gets a list of the device's FTP folders. Folder names returned by this method are not guaranteed to be unique. This is to allow for detection of share name collisions due to external forces, such as a user inserting two USB drives configured with colliding share names.

GetFTPServerSettings.name: http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/GetFTPServerSettings
GetFTPServerSettings.desc: This service provides access to a device's FTP folders. This action gets the device's FTP server settings.

isEnabled.desc: Whether the server is currently enabled.

isAnonymousReadAccessEnabled.desc: Whether anonymous FTP read access is currently enabled.

port.desc: The port that the FTP server is currently exposed on.

encoding.desc: The encoding used by the server.

supportedEncodings.desc: The list of encodings supported by the server.

maxFTPFolders.desc: A platform-specific limit on the number of FTP folders. If this value is not present, there is no limit to the number of FTP folders.

SetFTPServerSettings.name: http://linksys.com/jnap/storage/SetFTPServerSettings
SetFTPServerSettings.desc: This action sets the device's FTP server settings.

serverName.desc: The server name. The server name must be between 1 and 15 characters long and can only contain characters a-z, A-Z, 0-9, dash (-), and space ( ).

isEnabled.desc: Whether the server should be enabled.

isAnonymousReadAccessEnabled.desc: Whether anonymous FTP read access should be enabled.

port.desc: The port that the FTP server should be exposed on. This value must be between 0 and 65535.

encoding.desc: The encoding used by the server.

errors.ErrorInvalidPort: The specified port was not between 0 and 65535.
errors.ErrorInvalidServerName: The specified server name name is not valid.
errors.ErrorUnsupportedEncoding: The specified encoding is not supported by the server.

name.desc: The name of the shared folder.

partitionName.desc: The name of the partition on which the shared folder resides.

path.desc: The path to the directory that corresponds to the shared folder. Relative paths are interpreted as relative to the root directory of the partition.

pathExists.desc: Whether the path exists on the partition.

isReadOnly.desc: Whether the shared folder is read-only.

groupsWithPermission.desc: The list of groups that have permission to access the shared folder.
